committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to authorize the States to regulate the transfer of water to insure that federal regulation does not impair or impede the efforts of the States to protect and control this resource.

summary.text: Authorizes the States to regulate the transfer of surface or ground water located in the States. Prohibits the invalidation, impairment, or supersedure of any State water transfer law by any Act of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the States to regulate the transfer of water to insure that federal regulation does not impair or impede the efforts of the States to protect and control this resource.
